review_text: This mug is fantastic, it washes well, has a good weight, and can double as a nifty negotiation tool.  After all, who messes with a guy who has brass knuckles on his coffee mug?  Anyway, my husband has big hands and he says the knuckles are comfortable and easy to grip.  It arrived quickly and well packaged.  It's a winner, you won't be disappointed.
summary: Only for the SERIOUS coffee drinker
product_name: Design Fist Cup Brass Knuckle Duster Handle Coffee Milk Ceramic Fist Mug Cup Cool Gift
